          <title>
            <string language="de">Thanksgiving Games</string>
            <string language="en">Thanksgiving games</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeux de thanksgiving</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogos de Thanksgiving</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giochi di Thanksgiving</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδια ημέρας των ευχαριστιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juegos de Thanksgiving</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Englischsprachige Anleitung für fünf verschiedene Spiele zu Thanksgiving: Thanksgiving-Dinner, Turkey Hunt, Where is Mr. Turkey, Cornucopia und Pumpkin Roll.</string>
            <string language="en">English instructions to five different games for Thanksgiving: Thanksgiving Dinner, Turkey Hunt, Where is Mr. Turkey, Cornucopia and Pumpkin roll.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="de">Thanksgiving</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </structure>

            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Instructions anglaises à cinq jeux différents 
pour le Thanksgiving : Dîner de thanksgiving, chasse de la 
Turquie, où est le roulement de M. Turquie, de corne d'abondance et 
de potiron.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instruções inglesas a cinco jogos diferentes 
para Thanksgiving: Jantar de Thanksgiving, caça de Turquia, 
onde está o rolo do Sr. Turquia, do cornucopia e da abóbora.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Istruzioni inglesi a cinque giochi differenti per
Thanksgiving: Il pranzo di Thanksgiving, Turchia 
Cerca, dove è il rullo del sig. Turchia, del cornucopia e 
della zucca.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικές οδηγίες σε πέντε διαφορετικά παιχνίδια για 
την ημέρα των ευχαριστιών: Γεύμα ημέρας των ευχαριστιών, 
κυνήγι της Τουρκίας, πού είναι ρόλος του κ. Turkey, κέρων της
Αμαλθιας και κολοκύθας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Instrucciones inglesas a cinco diversos juegos 
para Thanksgiving: Cena de Thanksgiving, caza de Turquía, donde
está el rodillo de Sr. Turquía, del cornucopia y de la calabaza.</string>
          </description>
